library(tidyverse)

data	<- read_csv("C:/Users/Kevin/Desktop/CS329E/cs329e-project-4/NCHS_Leading_Causes_of_Death__United_States.csv",
col_types =	list(
    'Year' =	col_integer(),
    '113 Cause Name' =	col_character(),
    'Cause Name' =	col_character(),
    'State' =	col_character(),
    'Deaths' =	col_integer(),
    'Age-adjusted Death Rate' = col_number()
)) %>% dplyr::select(1:) %>% dplyr::filter('State' != 'United States') 
# & 'Deaths' != null

names(data)

for(n in names(data)) {
  data[n] <- data.frame(lapply(data[n], gsub, pattern="[^ -~]", replacement= ""))
}

write_csv(data, "C:/Users/Kevin/Desktop/CS329E/cs329e-project-4/cs329e-project-4/new_cause_of_death.csv")
'
